The FCC is tripping over itself, trying to respond to the myriad complaints they've fielded over a promotion for torturous syndicated show`` The Doctors'', which ran nationwide today: The FCC is currently investigating certain statements made while promoting a segment called` Secrets You Shouldn't Keep From Men,' when it is alleged that the line,` Excuse me, it's my yeast infection' is used, said FCC Chairman Colin Powell , Jr.`` Erp... I just threw up in my mouth a little.''`` Frankly, we didn't think anyone was watching,'' said executive producer Phil McGraw .``

`` not committed'' to supporting Barack Obama or a specific Republican candidate in 2012. Colin Powell , a retired Army general, said he won't decide whom to vote for until he sees all the candidates. Right now I do not see on the Republican side any one individual who I think is going to emerge at the top of the pile, he said, adding he thinks Barack Obama `` is doing a good job right now.''
